biotools.summary: Compares all available EST and mRNA sequences for a query organism against the set of transcripts for a reference organism. The results are presented graphically and relative to the location of genes on the chromosomes of the reference organism.

bioschemas.name: Iccare
bioschemas.summary: Compares all available EST and mRNA sequences for a query organism against the set of transcripts for a reference organism. The results are presented graphically and relative to the location of genes on the chromosomes of the reference organism.
